short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kyla MD Co-Pilot is engineered to empower doctors by enhancing their clinical decision-making.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Kyla MD Co-Pilot is an AI-powered assistant designed to improve clinical decision-making and reduce the time healthcare providers spend on routine tasks. Whether used as a browser extension with your existing EHR system or as a standalone web interface, Kyla MD Co-Pilot streamlines your workflow, allowing you to focus more on patient care.

To learn more about how Kyla MD Co-Pilot can transform your practice, visit our product landing page, https://kyla.com/products/md-copilot. When you’re ready to get started, simply install the extension and wait for an invitation from your clinic’s administrator. Clinics must first register through the Admin Panel and can then invite their doctors to the platform. Once invited, you’ll be set to experience a smarter, more efficient approach to healthcare. Start the process by registering at Admin Panel, https://md-admin.kyla.com.
